name: Jump To The Sky
description:
Description

Conquest the great path to sky with a slime, the weakest creature which even don't have legs! 

Jump To The Sky is a hardcore platform game. You will control a slime to try to arrive at the sky for helping a star sprite to go back home. Different from common platformers, our poor MC, the slime, can do nothing but jump. So whether it can complete the path only depends on your jumping skill. Of course you also need some patience and perseverance, because this journey is tough! 

  • High-difficulty and challenging stages. Different mechanisms and gimmicks in every stage.
  • Several hours to clear. Maybe shorter or longer considering of player's skill.
  • Easy operation. Just jump, jump and jump!
  • A failed jump is very bitter. Falling won't kill your slime, but make you progress regress.
  • Auto save after every jump, whether it is a successful jump.
  Control

 A mouse is enough! 

Drag to make jump dirction. 

The longer time left mouse button is hold, the stronger jump force is.(Certainly it has a max limit)
